metadata.subject: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623
metadata.title: Testament, codicille, dernieres actions, et mort heureuse de Philippes de Mornay, Sieur du Plessis Marly, cy deuant gouuerneur de la ville & chasteau de Saumur.
metadata.creator: Mornay, Philippe de,seigneur du Plessis-Marly,1549-1623.
Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623
Mornay, Charlotte Arbaleste de, d. 1606
metadata.description: The will and the codicile were drawn up jointly by Philippe de Mornay and his wife Charlotte Arbaleste.--cf. Bibl. Nat. Cat. gen., v. 119, col. 1043
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding. Some tight margins.
